name: Lerp

inputs.name: Start
inputs.description: The lower bound of the range

inputs.name: Stop
inputs.description: The upper bound of the range

inputs.name: Step
inputs.description: The value used to interpolate between Start and Stop. Value range: 0 to 1.

outputs.name: Result
outputs.description: The linear interpolation of Step between Start and Stop. When Step = 0, the result is Start, when Step = 1, the result is Stop.

description: Linearly interpolate a value within a range. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3 and Color.
